text.div:
Functional Status Observation: SNF MDS Functional Status Assessment within 3 Days of Discharge

What was the patients's usual performance related to their ability to bend/stoop from a standing position to pick up a small object, such as a spoon, from the floor?

code.text: What was the patients's usual performance related to their ability to bend/stoop from a standing position to pick up a small object, such as a spoon, from the floor?
